name: The End Of The World As We Know It presented by Matt Winning

shows.title: The End Of The World As We Know It
shows.desc:
Dr Matt Winning is thinking about starting a family but wonders if he should. A show about why our knowledge about climate change doesn’t necessarily match our action – by the Environmental Correspondent on TV’s Unspun with Matt Forde (Dave).

Dr Matt Winning is a London-based Scottish comedian and environmental economist with a PhD in climate change policy.
